Baldur's Gate 3 Misty Step Information

Description: Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Level: 2 School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Bonus Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Misty Step in Baldur's Gate 3

Misty Step can be acquired by the following classes and race(s): Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Circle of the Land: Coast, Circle of the Land: Underdark, Gloom Stalker, Oath of A
